mapper.select: SELECT p.*, ( SELECT MIN(sku.fixed_price) FROM app_product_sku sku WHERE sku.product_id = p.id and sku.deleted=0 and sku.locked=0 ) as productPrice , ( SELECT count(1) FROM app_product_sku sku WHERE sku.product_id = p.id and sku.reserve=0 and sku.deleted=0 and sku.locked=0 ) as skuZeroReserve FROM app_product p WHERE p.`status` = #{status} AND p.`name` like CONCAT(#{keyWord},'%')

SELECT p.*, ( SELECT MIN(sku.reserve) FROM app_product_sku sku WHERE sku.product_id = p.id and sku.deleted=0 and sku.locked=0 ) as productPrice, ( SELECT count(1) FROM app_product_sku sku WHERE sku.product_id = p.id and sku.reserve=0 and sku.deleted=0 and sku.locked=0 ) as skuZeroReserve FROM app_product p WHERE #{reserve} > ( SELECT MIN(sku.reserve) FROM app_product_sku sku WHERE sku.product_id = p.id and sku.deleted=0 and sku.locked=0 )
SELECT COUNT(1) AS result FROM ( SELECT 1 AS num FROM app_product_sku sku WHERE sku.reserve <#{reserve} GROUP BY sku.product_id ) AS skuCount
